PropertyResult.Strapline: ## Overview Excellent quality 4 star apartment-hotel in a great location right in the heart of Paris, perfect for leisure as well as business traveller. ## Location The residence is located in th
PropertyResult.Description: ## Overview Excellent quality 4 star apartment-hotel in a great location right in the heart of Paris, perfect for leisure as well as business traveller. ## Location The residence is located in the neighborhood of the Opera Garnier, in the same area as the Parisian department stores, such as Galeries Lafaytte and Printemps, the Madeleine church; it is a leisurely stroll from the Grands Boulevards which abound with cinemas, theatres, restaurants and bars. This property is ideally connected to the exceptionally dense Parisian public transportation network. ## Rooms This apartment-hotel opened its doors in 2007 and rooms are therefore in exceptional condition as well as air-conditioned. The one bedroom apartment lay-out and design is contemporary and items have been harmoniously assembled. Travellers will appreciate the simple design, cream and natural dark wood colour schemes and several standard amenities, including flat screen TV sets with integrated DVD players. The bedrooms consist of a solid comfortable bed and one or two convertible beds. The kitchen includes several standard units and features (microwaves, fridge, ceramic hob, dishwasher machine). The bathrooms are small and likewise in excellent condition. ## Food & Drink The breakfast room is on the ground floor, adjacent to the lobby and is spacious and bright. It has an attractive and warm colour with dark wooden tables. ## Tourist Information Central / 09e Arrondissement / Opera 26 kms to the airport (charles de gaulle) 28 kms to the airport (orly) 2 minute walk to the nearest metro station (havre caumartin/opera) Close to the station (saint lazare) 2 minute walk to the nearest bus stop 7 km to the nearest fair site (parc des exposition) ## Number of rooms 90 Single rooms Double rooms Twin rooms Triple rooms Suites Quad rooms

PropertyResult.Strapline: ##Overview Hotel Opera Cadet is located close to the center of the city and provides great accommodation for both business and leisure travelers. Among its amenities, the property features: meeting a
PropertyResult.Description: ##Overview Hotel Opera Cadet is located close to the center of the city and provides great accommodation for both business and leisure travelers. Among its amenities, the property features: meeting and conference rooms, 24h check-in, air conditioning, business services, babysitting services, concierge, access for disabled people, internet access, ironing services and laundry facilities. ##Location Due to its strategic location, the property offers great connections not only to various means of transportation (bus station, tube, train station, airport) but also to the main attractions of the city such as: Bourget aerospace museum, Chateau de Chantilly, City Center, Disneyland Paris, Louvre Museum and Musee d'Orsay. ##Rooms All rooms are comfortable, spacious and equipped with modern facilities such as: air conditioning, cable/satellite TV, cots on request, mini-bar, hairdryer, room service, safe in room, telephone and Wi-Fi connection. ##Food & drink Guests may unwind at the property’s bar. The hotel doesn't feature a restaurant.

Erratum.Subject: City Tax
Erratum.Description: Paris hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.

Erratum.Subject: Important information
Erratum.Description: Please note that hotels in France do not allow more than 2 adults and one child up to 10 years old in a double/twin room.

PropertyResult.Strapline: This is a 3 star hotel considered as a first property. The friendly staff guarantees for a pleasant stay. ## Location The hotel is situated in a quiet street, surrounded by shops and restaurants and
PropertyResult.Description: This is a 3 star hotel considered as a first property. The friendly staff guarantees for a pleasant stay. ## Location The hotel is situated in a quiet street, surrounded by shops and restaurants and is only one station by subway away from the Montparnasse Railway station. The bus stop is close by and the subway just a few minutes walk. ## Distance 2 kms to city centre 12 kms to the airport (orly) 35 kms to the airport (paris-charles de gaulle airport) 2 minute walk to the nearest metro station (pernety) 1 km to the nearest station (montparnasse) 2 minute walk to the nearest bus stop 2 km to the nearest fair site (porte de versailles) ## Rooms All rooms are nicely decorated with modern art pictures. The rooms are held in either a blue / yellow combination or blue with red and yellow. The yellow wallpapers create a bright atmosphere. The windows let a lot of light into the medium sized well equipped rooms. ## Restaurant The breakfast is held in the lower ground floor,and is very bright and airy due to the traditional white stonewalls. ## Exterior This is a traditional 5 storey building ## Lobby The reception desk is right at the entrance of the middle sized Reception. There is a sitting area with leather furniture for guests available which is part of the lobby.

PropertyResult.Strapline: Built in 2007, the hotel offers 59 rooms, meeting rooms for up to 40 people, modern and contemporary décor and a cosy atmosphere. There is a 24-hour reception, lift service, coffee bar, publicly avail
PropertyResult.Description: Built in 2007, the hotel offers 59 rooms, meeting rooms for up to 40 people, modern and contemporary décor and a cosy atmosphere. There is a 24-hour reception, lift service, coffee bar, publicly available Internet access, room and laundry services and a car park. ## Location The hotel is located in the cultural heart of Paris, in the Montparnasse district near to the 'Latin Quarter' and the Luxembourg Gardens. Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro and Gaîté Metro stations are nearby and all the major attractions such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Louvre are within easy reach - just 15 minutes away by public transport or between 30 and 50 minutes stroll through the fascinating city streets. ## Rooms Rooms have modern and contemporary décor and are equipped with a bathroom that gets plenty of natural light and contains a powerful hairdryer. Room amenities include a terrace, writing desk, wireless or cable Internet connection, direct dial telephone, individually adjustable air conditioning, satellite/cable flat-screen TV, telephone, minibar, iron and ironing board and a free to use safe-deposit box. ## Payment American Express, MasterCard and VISA are accepted.

PropertyResult.Strapline: Situated in the heart of the 18th arrondissement, a few steps away from Montmartre, KUBE is tucked away in a quiet street, sheltered from the city's crowds. Its historic facade hides an innovative and
PropertyResult.Description: ## Overview Kube Hotel is a futuristic design hotel in Paris located only steps from Montmartre. The hotel features 29 guestrooms and 12 suites, arranged around an open courtyard and accessed via colorful elevators. At the heart of the hotel is a spacious lounge-restaurant-bar, a futuristic, low-lit space with high ceilings. 2 state-of-the-art meeting rooms are at guests disposal as well. ## Location Situated in the heart of the 18th district, a few steps away from Montmartre, KUBE Hotel is tucked away in a quiet street, sheltered from the city’s crowd. Eurostar Terminal and TGV (Gare du Nord) are 5 minutes walk and Métro: Line2, La Chapelle are 3 minutes away. Paris Roissy Charles de Gaulle airport is 25 km away. ## Rooms Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, video games and a private bathroom with luxury products. Further facilities include hairdryer, mini bar, coffee/tea machine and safe. Room service and Wi-Fi access are available. ## Food & Drink This Paris hotel offers a restaurant, a coffee shop/café, and a bar/lounge. ## Tourist Information Chapelle metro station - 2 min walk Gare du Nord - 5 min walk Charles de Gaulle airport - 25 km

PropertyResult.Strapline: Location This pleasant city hotel lies on the left-hand bank of the River Seine and is one of the top Paris addresses during the summer amongst celebrities such as James Joyce and Giorgio de Chirico.
PropertyResult.Description: Location This pleasant city hotel lies on the left-hand bank of the River Seine and is one of the top Paris addresses during the summer amongst celebrities such as James Joyce and Giorgio de Chirico. The picturesque Parisian district of Saint Germain des Pres lies approximately 700 m from the hotel and the cathedral of Notre-Dame de Paris in addition to the Eiffel Tower lie within 2 km of the hotel. Paris' Orly airport lies some 15 km away whilst it is around 25 km to Charles de Gaulle airport. Facilities The hotel features 62 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. The hotel offers various facilities for guests with disabilities. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a breakfast room and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are room service and a laundry. A conference area with a conference room, a business centre and a secretarial service is available. Rooms The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A double bed is provided in the carpeted accommodation units. Cots are available for children. A safe and a minibar also feature. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Additional features, including internet access, a telephone, a TV, a DVD player and wireless internet access, contribute to a great stay. Guests will also find slippers provided. Some of the rooms are wheelchair-accessible. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Meals Breakfast is bookable as a board option. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.

PropertyResult.Strapline: ##General 4 star accommodations, accessible to many local attractions, designed to meet families needs, ideal accommodations for a vacation getaway. Local Attractions Tuileries Gardens - 50 meters, Pl
PropertyResult.Description: ##General 4 star accommodations, accessible to many local attractions, designed to meet families needs, ideal accommodations for a vacation getaway. Local Attractions Tuileries Gardens - 50 meters, Place de la Vendme - 100 meters, Place de la Concorde - 100 meters, The Louvre - 200 meters. Services 24 hr front desk service, business services available at front desk, concierge services, elevators, valet dry cleaning and laundry services. ##Rooms The Melia Vendome hotel has 85 comfortable rooms, including 6 deluxe rooms and 5 junior suites, all featuring private bathroom with hair dryer to ensure an enjoyable stay in the heart of Paris. All rooms have been completely renovated and equipped. The sleek and refined creates a quiet and relaxing. The rooms have satellite TV, air conditioning, heating, safe, minibar, wireless Internet access, flat screen TV, pay TV. Internet access is subject to standard and supplement the pay TV is extra in all accommodations. The Superior has a private bathroom, slippers, bed DreaMax. The deluxe and junior suites have a bathroom, slippers, Internet access, DreaMax bed, 2 small bottles of water at mini bar (replaced every day if consumed), wellcome VIP with half a bottle of champagne and deluxe junior suites at arrival. All rooms are no - smoking. ##Lobby The hotel offers a comfortable and refined marble floors, antique tapestries, wood paneled bar in perfect Parisian style. ##Restaurant Nearby restaurant, full service bar/lounge.

PropertyResult.Strapline: Amarante Beau Manoir is a 4 star hotel located on the right bank, close to the famous Madeleine church, the Champs-Elysees and the Opera de Paris..
PropertyResult.Description: ## Overview The Amarante Beau Manoir is located in the heart of Paris, near the Madeleine Church, surrounded by stunning flower, gourmet and luxury shops. Many museums, countless bars and restaurants are to be found in the vicinity. This hotel features a total of 60 designed rooms spread over 5 floors. All rooms and suites include individual air conditioning, complimentary WiFi, a private bathroom with hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, a TV with LCD screen as well as a minibar. ## Location Located on the right bank in the heart of Paris, the hotel is on rue de l'Arcade. The hotel is close to the famous Madeleine church. The Champs-Elysees, Place de la Concorde, the museums and the River Seine, edged by historical monuments are only a few steps away. ## Rooms The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, personal safe, minibar, flat-screen satellite TV and WI-FI internet access. There is also a private marbled bathroom with hair-dryer. ## Features Facilities and services for guests include a PC web corner, room service and WI-FI internet. ## Food & Drink Delicious buffet breakfast is served every morning. ## Tourist information 5 min walk to the nearest metro Madeleine 5 min walk to the nearest bus Madeleine 10 min walk to the nearest train station Saint- Lazare 3.5 km to the trade fair ground Porte Maillot 20 km to the nearest airport Orly Ory 25 km to the airpot Roissy CDG

PropertyResult.Strapline: ## Overview Eugene en Ville is placed between Montmartre and the Opera House. This 4 star property offers good value accommodation for all types of travelers with business services, free Wi-Fi connec
PropertyResult.Description: ## Overview Eugene en Ville is placed between Montmartre and the Opera House. This 4 star property offers good value accommodation for all types of travelers with business services, free Wi-Fi connection and well-equipped rooms. ## Location This hotel is located in a central neighborhood where guests can enjoy the best of Paris. Eugene en Ville is a few minutes away from the Modern Art Museum while leisure travelers will have easy access to art galleries and museums as well as the best restaurants and bars which are walking distance or just a couple of subway stops away. Galleries Lafayette is also nearby. ## Rooms The hotel boasts well equipped rooms with amenities including: air conditioning, hair dryer, and safe, as well as cable/satellite TV. Residents of this hotel can stay connected with free in room Wi-fi. ## Food and drink While lodging at this property, one can enjoy oysters at the seafood bar in a modern yet cozy atmosphere on the ground floor. ## Tourist information Central 2 minute walk to Pelletier or cadet metro station 10 minute walk to Gare du Nord 8 kilometers to Porte de Versailles 27 kilometers to Paris Charles de Gaulle

PropertyResult.Strapline: Ideally located in Paris's 9th arrondissement, Rsidence NELL welcomes you to the intimacy of a private mansion. This unique setting contains 17 apartments and studios with capacity for 6 people, all d
PropertyResult.Description: Ideally located in Paris's 9th arrondissement, Rsidence NELL welcomes you to the intimacy of a private mansion. This unique setting contains 17 apartments and studios with capacity for 6 people, all designed by Patrick Jouin, available to you for stays of a night, a week or a month. Welcome to Rsidence NELL, combining the luxury of a pied terre with the carefully designed decor and comfort of a four-star service. The Rsidence Nell's studios and apartments are real living spaces of refined comfort, soberly fitted out in an elegant and chic style, conducive to peace and relaxation. The Charm and More group has designed Rsidence NELL **** to have a confidential and refined ambiance. The Residence NELL is located 60, Rue Richer, at the crossroad of the so parisian Rue du Faubourg Montmartre and the delightful rue Cadet, right in the heart of the 9th arrondissement of Paris. A private parking is available on request. The Residence NELL can also book for you a car with private driver or a motorcycle taxi.

PropertyResult.Strapline: ## Overview Excellent quality 4 star apartment-hotel in a great location right in the heart of Paris, perfect for leisure as well as business traveller. ## Location The residence is located in th
PropertyResult.Description: ## Overview Excellent quality 4 star apartment-hotel in a great location right in the heart of Paris, perfect for leisure as well as business traveller. ## Location The residence is located in the neighborhood of the Opera Garnier, in the same area as the Parisian department stores, such as Galeries Lafaytte and Printemps, the Madeleine church; it is a leisurely stroll from the Grands Boulevards which abound with cinemas, theatres, restaurants and bars. This property is ideally connected to the exceptionally dense Parisian public transportation network. ## Rooms This apartment-hotel opened its doors in 2007 and rooms are therefore in exceptional condition as well as air-conditioned. The one bedroom apartment lay-out and design is contemporary and items have been harmoniously assembled. Travellers will appreciate the simple design, cream and natural dark wood colour schemes and several standard amenities, including flat screen TV sets with integrated DVD players. The bedrooms consist of a solid comfortable bed and one or two convertible beds. The kitchen includes several standard units and features (microwaves, fridge, ceramic hob, dishwasher machine). The bathrooms are small and likewise in excellent condition. ## Food & Drink The breakfast room is on the ground floor, adjacent to the lobby and is spacious and bright. It has an attractive and warm colour with dark wooden tables. ## Tourist Information Central / 09e Arrondissement / Opera 26 kms to the airport (charles de gaulle) 28 kms to the airport (orly) 2 minute walk to the nearest metro station (havre caumartin/opera) Close to the station (saint lazare) 2 minute walk to the nearest bus stop 7 km to the nearest fair site (parc des exposition) ## Number of rooms 90 Single rooms Double rooms Twin rooms Triple rooms Suites Quad rooms

PropertyResult.Strapline: Location This attractive city hotel is located in the Rue de la Paix at heart of Paris, between the Rue Vendome and the opera house. Les Tuileries, the Louvre and Faubourg Saint Honore are only a shor
PropertyResult.Description: Location This attractive city hotel is located in the Rue de la Paix at heart of Paris, between the Rue Vendome and the opera house. Les Tuileries, the Louvre and Faubourg Saint Honore are only a short walk away. Opera underground station is a 2-minute walk and the Gare du Nord Eurostar Station is around 2.5 km away. The transfer time to Orly airport takes around 40 minutes and Charles de Gaulle airport is 45 minutes from the hotel. Facilities The hotel features 102 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Additional features of the hotel include a newspaper stand and a TV room. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. The carpeted accommodation units feature a double bed or a king-size bed. Among the amenities are a safe, a minibar and a desk. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment Leisure options at the hotel include a gym, a spa, a sauna and a steam bath. For a fee, gymnastics and massage treatments are also available. An entertainment programme for adults and live music complete the range of options available. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.
